analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0x9c254d00c9f03ea398ce3034da18cbad54fb316b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/30/0x9c254d00c9f03ea398ce3034da18cbad54fb316b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_name' of IndexManager. (/unique_chucks/30/0x9c254d00c9f03ea398ce3034da18cbad54fb316b.sol#54-55) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_date' of IndexManager.addIndexInitialization (/unique_chucks/30/0x9c254d00c9f03ea398ce3034da18cbad54fb316b.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_indexName' of IndexManager.addIndexInitialization (/unique_chucks/30/0x9c254d00c9f03ea398ce3034da18cbad54fb316b.sol) is not in mixedCase
